testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of satisfied customers trust Mekaddesh for their beauty routine

1.text: Mekaddesh products have transformed my beauty routine. My skin has never felt so soft and radiant. Highly recommended!
1.name: Sarah Johnson

2.text: Incredible quality. The revitalizing serum is my favorite product. I noticed results from the first week. Worth every penny!
2.name: Emily Rodriguez

3.text: Mekaddesh exceeded all my expectations. The products are natural, effective, and customer service is exceptional. Thank you!
3.name: Jessica Martinez

4.text: Since using the golden moisturizing cream, my skin looks younger and brighter. My friends are already asking what I'm using.
4.name: Amanda Thompson

5.text: The complete kit is perfect to start. All products work in harmony and results are visible quickly.
5.name: Olivia Brown

6.text: Luxury products at a fair price. The quality is exceptional and the packaging is beautiful. I will definitely buy again.
6.name: Sophia Williams

products_page.subtitle: Discover our exclusive collection of beauty products carefully formulated to enhance your natural beauty

products_component.subtitle: Discover our premium selection of beauty products carefully formulated for you

Facial Cleanser.name: Facial Cleanser
Facial Cleanser.description: Gentle facial cleanser that removes impurities, excess oil, and residue without drying the skin. Leaves face fresh, balanced, and ready for hydration, maintaining a light and natural feeling.

Facial Cream.name: Facial Cream
Facial Cream.description: Fast-absorbing nourishing facial cream that deeply hydrates and helps keep skin soft, firm, and radiant. Protects the skin barrier, improves texture, and leaves a natural, healthy finish all day long.

Hyaluronic Acid.name: Hyaluronic Acid
Hyaluronic Acid.description: High-purity hydrating serum that helps retain skin's natural moisture, leaving it softer, brighter, and smoother. Reduces fine lines, improves elasticity, and adds a healthy glow from the first application.

footer.slogan: Your beauty is our passion. Premium products for radiant skin.
footer.powered: Powered and designed by Freedom Labs

about.title: About
about.subtitle: We are a brand committed to your beauty and wellness, offering carefully selected products to enhance your natural beauty. Our mission is to provide the highest quality products that celebrate and enhance your unique beauty.

premium.title: Premium Quality
premium.desc: Highest quality products with natural ingredients

care.title: Personalized Care
care.desc: Each product is designed with your well-being in mind

natural.title: Natural Beauty
natural.desc: Enhance your natural beauty without harsh products

safe.title: Safe and Tested
safe.desc: All our products are dermatologically tested

mission.title: Our
mission.p1: At Mekaddesh, we believe everyone deserves to feel beautiful and confident. That's why we dedicate ourselves to creating products that not only enhance your outer beauty but also nourish your inner well-being.
mission.p2: We work with natural and sustainable ingredients, ensuring each product is safe, effective, and environmentally friendly.

team.title: Our Team
team.desc: Our team consists of beauty experts, dermatologists, and scientists working together to create innovative products that truly work. Each product undergoes rigorous testing to ensure maximum quality.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We are here to help. Send us a message and we will respond as soon as possible.
contact.success: Thank you for your message! We will contact you soon.
